Control.Name: input_b_PublicHistory
Control.Tooltip: Check this box to allow others to see your Biography entry.

Control.Name: input_b_ShowPlayerNameplate
Control.Tooltip: Changing this requires a UI reload to take effect.

Control.Name: input_n_Offset
Control.Tooltip: This field will vertically offset the nameplates.

Control.Name: btn_ResetDefaults_Markup
Control.Tooltip: Resets all styles to the defaults.

Control.Name: btn_ClearCache
Control.Tooltip: WARNING! Will clear all cached player data (excluding yours).
